description:
* This application is very useful to know when will be your  period starts and ends, when will be your fertilise days and when you have to test for a pregnancy (home pregnancy test).

* The calendar feature gives you easy navigation to your present, past and future data. By just clicking on the date your can easily add a log.

* By just taping on the Calendar you can see your present month data like period days, fertility days, pregnancy test day etc..

* Log having features like flow type, mood, weight, temperature, and note. So you can use this app to keep track of your health daily.

* Reports screen shows your mood, weight and temperature line graph by weekly, monthly and quarterly, so you can easily analyse  your health status.

* This app is Password Protected, so no one can’t access your private data without having the password.
